name: Create or update records in Ninox from Jotform submissions
description: Streamline your data management process by automatically transferring form submissions from JotForm to Ninox. With this template, every time a new submission is received in JotForm, Make will create or update the corresponding records in your Ninox database. This integration ensures that your data is always up-to-date and easily accessible, enhancing your workflow efficiency and reducing manual entry errors. Perfect for teams looking to maintain accurate records and improve their data handling capabilities.
